::Firearm::

Firearm sighs, sitting down next to Spears. "But any information you 
could give us about the Trainers could help get Striker back, if its 
possible."

He was feeling sorry for her, but he didn't know the pain of losing 
someone you love, other than family.

"Maybe you know what they did to him?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Spears::
> 
> She looked at Firearm, tears freeflowing down her cheeks. She only 
> nodded to him. Her throat was to tied up in knots to speak.  She 
> raised her hand and put it over Firearms's. Fear, pain, desperation 
> showed in her tearful eyes.  She put her hands over her face again 
as 
> she contined to cry.  Life wouldn't be worth livng without 
Striker.  
> She didn't want to go on and live her life without him. 
Reprogrammed 
> or not, she would go after him and try to bring her love back. Or 
die 
> in the attempt.
